fields.title: Back Pain
fields.description: I would like some advice on how to align my back in this pose. I am experiencing pain in my shoulders. Can someone help?

fields.title: Help with my hips!
fields.description: I tore my hip flex while I was squatting, does anyone have suggestions on what stretches are best for this?

fields.title: Stretching advice.
fields.description: I am a climber and I would like to incorporate stretching into my regiment. What poses are the best for beginners? My arms and back need the most attention.
